markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Cantrip](/Traits.aspx?ID=550)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 453 <sup>2.0</sup>

A spell you can cast at will that is automatically heightened to half your level rounded up.
name: Cantrip
